Texto: 
n/a
none required.
pa chest radiograph demonstrating a thin line extending from the right lung apex to an ovoid opacity in the right paratracheal region (denoted with two arrows) in a curvilinear fashion consistent with an azygous fissure, a normal variant.
azygous lobe (azygous fissure)
• azygous fissure
• azygous lobe
• scar
• atelectasis
26 year-old woman with a positive ppd, otherwise asymptomatic.
please see topic: http://rad.usuhs.edu/medpix/medpix.html?mode=single&recnum=4181#pic

video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_azbc3a1efs
